title: Heat Sink Optimization (MATLAB)
summary: Optimized fin spacing and thickness for a compact thermal management system using parametric sweeps and fmincon.

title: Gearbox Design (SolidWorks)
summary: Modeled helical gear train; validated contact ratio and bearing loads. Produced drawings and exploded views.

title: Cleanroom Layout (Revit)
summary: Conceptual ISO‑9 cleanroom with HVAC zoning, airflow visualization, and equipment schedule.
